name: "Flower-Feather Clan" (In Effect)
description: The next time this character switches to become your active character, recover 1 Elemental Die of the corresponding color. (Can stack. Triggers 1 stack each time.)
descriptionraw: The next time this character switches to become your active character, recover 1 Elemental Die of the corresponding color. (Can stack. Triggers 1 stack each time.)
descriptionreplaced: The next time this character switches to become your active character, recover 1 Elemental Die of the corresponding color. (Can stack. Triggers 1 stack each time.)
